message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $11,000. It's in excellent condition and worth every penny. Let me know what you think!
Hi Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but I am only able to pay up to $9,500 for it. I hope this aligns with your expectations.
Bob, I appreciate your offer, but $9,500 is a bit too low for me. I'm willing to come down to $10,500. It's still a good deal considering the value of the product.  What do you say?
